data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Das, Indraneil, Haas, Alexander (2010): New species of Microhyla from Sarawak: Old World’s smallest frogs crawl out of miniature pitcher plants on Borneo (Amphibia: Anura: Microhylidae). Zootaxa 2571: 37-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197388
